mapper.insert: insert into board(boardSEQ, boardTitle, boardContent, boardID, boardDate) values(boardSEQ.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardID}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select boardSEQ, boardTitle, boardContent, boardID, boardDate from board order by boardDate DESC
select boardSEQ, boardTitle, boardContent, boardID, boardDate from board where boardSEQ=#{boardSEQ}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(replySEQ, boardSEQ, replyID, replyContent, replyDate) values (replySEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardSEQ}, #{replyID}, #{replyContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select replySEQ, boardSEQ, replyID, replyContent, replyDate from reply where boardSEQ = #{boardSEQ} order by replyDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into fileinfo(fileSEQ, boardSEQ, orgName, savName) values (fileSEQ.NEXTVAL, (select Max(boardSEQ) from board), #{orgName}, #{savName})
mapper.select: select fileSEQ, boardSEQ, orgName, savName from fileinfo where boardSEQ = #{boardSEQ}
